antharjathika polisiya aya pilibandawa lankawe thibena owunge shakhawata danum di athath kawara aakarayakin ho athadanguwata ganimen walaki sitimata aya samath wi thibe.me dedena 1990 okthobarwaladi wiwaha wi thibena athara ithaliyen raugena aa mudal yoda mahanuwara, sha්ri sangharaja mawathen rung 01 parchas 10ka idamak miladi gena sancharaka hotalayak idikirima sandaha ema idama ugas kota lanka bankuwen laksha 338ka naya mudalak da labagena thibe.eheth me dedenata sarthaka pawul jiwithayak gatha karannata hakiwi natha.

aruna sar:"aththatama mama puduma nowanne obata bimi mattama gana hithanne nathuwa idiriyatama tharkaya gena nisa.8000k lamayi inna iskoleka dawasakata kalajeda hathak ugannana guruwarunta lamayin thanithaniwa aran obakiyana lesa katayuthu kalahaki pra yogika thathwayak oba dakinawada??"prayogika thathwayan gana katha karanne nam, sisuwan 8,000k iganuma labana pasalaka ee sisuwan 8,000 samagama kriya kirime awasthawak kisidu guruwarayekuta uda nowana bawa oba dannawa wiya yuthuya.

bauddha suthra deshana mangin ehi sanjanana pathikada manawa wigranaha kere.ehi aanupubbiya ratawa mangin kranamikawa shranawakayage awadhanaya randawa ganimata watapitawak sakasa atha.deshana madhy manawa bhawitha karamin awashyawa aramuna sadhanaya kalahaki lesa suthr deshana idiripathwa thibe.suthrangadeshanawala gabwana samastha darshanika haraya chathurarya sathya kuluganwima padaka karagena atha.ekwarama chathurarya sathyanaya idiripath kirimata wada awadhanaya randawimata mulikathwaya pirinami thibe.emangin krayamika piyawara osse shra waka awadhanaya gilihi noyana paridi deshanawe haraya labadima aramunayi.mehidi awadhanaya mulika deshanawa kerehi randawima pinisa wiwidha upakra ma bhawitha wi thibe.ehidi manawayage sahaja manasika hadathala ha pahayata anurupa wana paridi chalaka lakshanaye sita bhawamaya hangim niwa damimatath anathuruwa buddhimaya pathikada awadikirimatath krishaya kara thibe.sila, samadhi ha prignya lesa anukranamika prapathipadawa sakasi aththe mita anugathawaya.deshana madhya ya pawa sakaswa aththe me anukra mika pralathipadawata obina lesaya.ee anuwa muladi dana kathawa hewath danaye anusas pilibanda pahadili karadenu labe.danaya nam aamisha wasthu athharimayi.me mangin uparibhoga bhauthika wasthu pilibanda thrushnawa adu karanu labe.meya prahadhana wanuye mulika awashyotha thrupthimath kirima sathwayage sahaja lakshanaya wana bawini.mulika manawa awashyaratha lesa salakenuye aahara pana,wasthrana,niwasa ha aarakshana awashyathatha wani deyi.eeta amatharawa aushadha ha wenath pra thyasa awashyakathada mulika awashya,tha ganayehila salakiya haka.bohowita suthrideshanawala danaya warnana kara thibenuye kenekuge mulika awashya tha thrupthimath karaganima sandaha awashyara karana bhauthika drewyu kerehi pawathitha alma durukirime paramarthaya itukara ganima sandahaya.oonama ayekuta bauddha prethipadawe aarambhaka piyawara se meya kribhayathmaka kalahakiwima wisheshathwayaki.
